text: Va padaru modarasro ʙar taxt nisond va [hamagi] ʙarojas ʙa sacda aftodand va [Jusuf] guft: «Padarcon, in ta'ʙir [-i hamon] xoʙam ast, ki pestar dida ʙudam. Parvardigoram onro rost gardonid [va tahaqquq ʙaxsid]. Jaqinan, U ʙa man neki kard, ki maro az zindon ʙerun ovard va pas az on ki sajton mijoni manu ʙarodaronam fitna ʙarpo kard, sumoro az ʙijoʙon [-i Kan'on ʙa Misr] ovard. Be tardid, Parvardigoram dar on ci mexohad, ʙorikʙin ast. Ba rosti, ki U donoi hakim ast
